known_issues: Logo image not displaying in the logo box (likely incorrect asset path/reference handling in Vite: public vs src/assets import).

existing_features.title: Add the user-uploaded logo image file to the frontend static assets so it is served at the exact path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., place/overwrite the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`) without modifying the image content (keep the white background; do not make it transparent).

projectName: Fix logo not displaying by placing uploaded logo asset at the referenced path
